application.Entities

Class StraightLineEnemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Entities.Entity
      • application.Entities.SimpleEnemies
        • application.Entities.StraightLineEnemy

  • public class StraightLineEnemy
extends SimpleEnemies
    Creates an enemy that moves in a straight direction and reverses the direction when hitting an object. Sub Class of SimpleEnemies therefore also a sub class of Entities.
    Version:
    2.1.0
    Author:
    Nayan Shrees

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StraightLineEnemy(int xPos, int yPos, java.lang.String direction)
      Calls the parents constructor setting the x and y position and sets the initial direction of the enemy.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StraightLineEnemy

        public StraightLineEnemy(int xPos,
                         int yPos,
                         java.lang.String direction)
        Calls the parents constructor setting the x and y position and sets the initial direction of the enemy.
        Parameters:
        xPos - The x position.
        yPos - The y position.
        direction - The string with the initial direction of the enemy from the level file.

    • Method Detail

      • loadEntity

        public javafx.scene.image.Image loadEntity()
        Loads the enemy's sprite.
        Specified by:
        loadEntity in class Entity
        Returns:
        Image with the enemy's sprite loaded or null if the enemy's sprite fails to load.

      • updatePosition

        public void updatePosition(Level level)
        Updates the enemy's position to travel in one straight direction. Reverses the direction if the enemy is about to collide with a cell that isn't a ground cell.
        Specified by:
        updatePosition in class SimpleEnemies
        Parameters:
        level - The current level.
